name: Belmez
overview: Belmez, in Spain, is known for its limestone rock and unique formations. It's a popular bouldering spot with a wide range of difficulties and styles. The ideal season to visit is during the autumn and spring.

Belmez, en España, es conocido por su roca de caliza y sus formaciones únicas. Es un lugar popular para la escalada con una amplia gama de dificultades y estilos. La temporada ideal para visitar es en otoño y primavera.
